code: import axios from'axios';var getAllEvents=function getAllEvents(){return axios.get('/api/events/').then(function(response){return response.data;}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};var getEventDetails=function getEventDetails(id){return axios.get("/api/events/".concat(id)).then(function(response){return response.data;}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};var getEventsByCreator=function getEventsByCreator(creatorId){return axios.get("/api/events/creator/".concat(creatorId)).then(function(response){return response.data;}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};var deleteEvent=function deleteEvent(eventId){console.log('delete event called');return axios.delete("/api/events/".concat(eventId)).then(function(response){return response.data;}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};export{getAllEvents,getEventDetails,getEventsByCreator,deleteEvent};
